### Set Up -------------------------------------------------------------------

## Install Packages that may be needed

```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("palmerpenguins")
install.packages("assertr")
install.packages("lubridate")
install.packages("stringdist")
install.packages("GGally")
install.packages("sf")
install.packages("taxize")

library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(assertr)
library(lubridate)
library(stringdist)
library(GGally)
library(sf)
library(taxize)
```

## Set up working directory and import files

```{r}
# Set working directory
setwd("~/Simon Fraser University/Classes/Scientific Data Management for Ecology and Evolution")

#Import data files

#Template if only importing one file: my_data <- read.csv("your_file.csv") 

myfiles <- list.files(path = "BWG_database_messy", pattern = "*.csv", full.names = TRUE)

# import all required files as individual data frames, remove file path and file extensions
list2env(
  lapply(
    setNames(myfiles, 
             make.names(
               gsub(".*1_", "", 
                    tools::file_path_sans_ext(myfiles)))), 
         read_csv), 
  envir = .GlobalEnv)

```
